slides.title: In case of an active emergency, dial 112.
slides.body:
BIG BROTHER is not the police system. We are a bridge — built to keep you safe and to make sure safety systems are never out of reach.

If you are ready, feeling safe and calm — say hey, BIG BROTHER.

slides.title: Your Safety Is in Your Hands.
slides.body: Always trust your instincts. Stay aware of your surroundings, and remember — BIG BROTHER is your quiet companion, helping you stay safe step by step.

slides.title: Our Promise.
slides.body:
It’s not that we don’t want to get to know you — we want you to feel safe being yourself, confident that you are in control.

Our purpose is to make the world safer for you, your loved ones, and those around you.

BIG BROTHER is built on insight-driven safety — using anonymous patterns and community alerts to make your routes and your city a little safer every day.

slides.title: Your Part of the Promise.
slides.body:
By continuing, you agree to use BIG BROTHER responsibly:

– With respect for privacy. You will not try to access anyone else’s information. You can’t. We don’t either.

– For genuine safety only. False alerts divert real help.

– With consent. Add guardians only with their knowledge.

– With truth. The details you share during an alert help rescuers reach you faster.

slides.title: Glossary
slides.body:
• Guardians – Your trusted circle who can see your alerts.
• Blips – Other users visible only when you’re stationary, ensuring you’re not alone.
• Vault – A secure, encrypted space for evidence or sensitive uploads.
• Panic – A distress alert sent to guardians.
• SOS – Emergency escalation connecting you with authorities.

slides.title: Who Would You Like to Have Your Back?
slides.body: BIG BROTHER is your circle of trust. Add your guardians — those who will be notified in case of emergencies.

slides.title: The Blips Around You.
slides.body: The moving dots you’ll see on your map are others who’ve agreed to offer their help if needed. You can’t identify them, but know they’re part of your extended circle.

slides.title: Access Priming.
slides.body:
To work best, BIG BROTHER needs access to location, microphone, and sensors.

This ensures your guardians and first responders can reach you when you need help.

slides.title: The Pledge.
slides.body:
I promise to use BIG BROTHER responsibly, with honesty and empathy.

I understand that every alert may be a lifeline, and I will treat it as one.

slides.title: Welcome to Your Safe Place.
slides.body:
The universe of safety runs through you.

Take a deep breath.

You’re not alone anymore.
